import{signout}from"../../api/AuthApi/authApi";// helper methods to stor and retrieve jwt credentails from client side througg session storage
var auth={isAuthenticated:function isAuthenticated(){if(typeof window=="undefined")return false;if(sessionStorage.getItem("jwt")){return JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("jwt"));}else{return false;}},authenticate:function authenticate(jwt,cb){if(typeof window!=="undefined")sessionStorage.setItem("jwt",JSON.stringify(jwt));cb();},clearJWT:function clearJWT(cb){if(typeof window!=="undefined")sessionStorage.removeItem("jwt");cb();signout().then(function(data){document.cookie="t=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:00 UTC; path=/;";});}};export default auth;
